## Question 4

### a) Using the constrat $\mu = 0$:

``` {r design_mat, echo=TRUE}

data("iris");

Y <- iris[order(iris$Species), "Sepal.Width"];

X <- diag(3) %x% rep(1, 50);

```
Then we calculate the estimated $\hat{\beta} = (X^TX )^{-1}X^T Y$ as

``` {r beta_hat, echo=TRUE}

beta = (t(X) %*% X) %>% solve() %*% t(X) %*% Y;

```
